title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 242-3.1 - General CO[2] budget permit requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 242-3.1 - General CO[2] budget permit requirements

State Regulations
(a) Each CO
2
budget
source must have a permit issued by the department pursuant to Parts 201 and
621 of this Title. (b) Each
CO
2
budget permit shall contain all applicable
CO
2

Budget Trading Program requirements and which shall
be a complete and distinguishable portion of the permit under subdivision (a)
of this section. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
242-3.1

Amended

New

York State Register December 16, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 50, eff. 12/31/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
